title: ROOMS FOR RENT (FURNISHED APARTMENT)
posting_body: ['Large furnished, 3-bedroom apartment in private 3 family, owner-occupied home, near public transportation, (area served by the Orange and Silver lines) is available for rent: Large bedroom, queen bed, utilities included $1,250.', ' Professionals are welcome.', '➢\tFirst floor 3-bedroom apartment', '➢    Small sitting area right off kitchen', '➢\tBack porch with access to shared backyard patio', '➢\tWasher/dryer', '➢\tDishwasher', 'EASY ACCESS TO SHOPPING, DINING, COMMUTER RAIL', 'Within easy access to: Newbury Street; Copley Place; Prudential Center; Downtown Boston; Columbus Avenue; Tremont Street; Washington Street; South Bay Shopping Center; SoWa Open Market, Arts & Design District (South of Washington); Whole Foods (3 locations within 2miles)', 'AREA HOSPITALS INCLUDE:', "Beth Israel Deaconess; Brighams and Women's; Boston Medical Center; New England Baptist; Mass General and more.", 'COLLEGES AND UNIVERSITIES:', 'Boston University (Boston University 3.3miles); Northeastern University; University of Mass in Boston; Wentworth University; Emmanuel College; Emerson College; Simmons College; Berklee College of Music; Mass College of Art; Harvard Medical School; MIT (across the Charles River in Cambridge, MA only 3.2miles)', 'MUSEUMS AND THEATRES', "Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum; Museum of Fine Arts; Children's Museum; John F Kennedy, Presidential Library and Museum; Boston Tea Party; Ships & Museum, The Franklin Park Zoo, among others.", 'Notes:', '*No smoking.', '*On-street Parking', '*Available July 1, 2022']
